info.title: GameRegistry API
info.description: us.es ETSII Computer Engineering, Distributed Systems course, a simple information system that stores game sessions.

get.summary: Returns a collection of game sessions.
get.description: This resource represents the collection of game sessions. It also accepts query arguments for filtering.

parameters.name: gameregistry-user
parameters.description: The used identifier used in the Login Server.

parameters.name: gameregistry-token
parameters.description: The token related to the user specified in 'gameregistry-user'.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: If specified, retrieve only GameSessions of this user

post.summary: Adds a new session to the game session collection.
post.description: The new session will have the end date open. To close it see PUT /sessions/{id}.

parameters.name: gameregistry-user
parameters.description: The used identifier used in the Login Server.

parameters.name: gameregistry-token
parameters.description: The token related to the user specified in 'gameregistry-user'.

201.description: The game session was successfully added to the server.

get.summary: Returns a game session given an id.

parameters.name: gameregistry-user
parameters.description: The used identifier used in the Login Server.

parameters.name: gameregistry-token
parameters.description: The token related to the user specified in 'gameregistry-user'.

put.summary: Marks the GameSession as finished and stores the game result.

parameters.name: gameregistry-user
parameters.description: The used identifier used in the Login Server.

parameters.name: gameregistry-token
parameters.description: The token related to the user specified in 'gameregistry-user'.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: The result of the game session.

404.description: If the game session was not found.

delete.summary: Removes a game session from the server.

parameters.name: gameregistry-user
parameters.description: The used identifier used in the Login Server.

parameters.name: gameregistry-token
parameters.description: The token related to the user specified in 'gameregistry-user'.

404.description: No game session with the given 'id' has been found.

id.description: an UUID that uniquely identifies the game session.

start.description: Start date of the game session.

end.description: End date of the game session.

result.description: The result of the game session.
